attributes.action: Stop Car Garages Cashing in your car tax making a profit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You see a car in a car garage or a dealer and you wanna buy it they part exhange your vehicle.But you have just taxed your own car for the year costing £120-180 you want that other car but has no tax on it. but you leave the 6 months tax on it or a year and the garage then cashes it in. Making easy cash under your nose. Then offers the next customer only 6 months tax or only taxes your car for 6 months
My aim is to stop car garages dealers doing this once a car is taxed it should be kept taxed.Regardless of whats left on the end date.
